content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe, it's a pleasure to meet you. As the landlord, I am open to negotiating the rental price of the apartment. What price range would you be comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: 500 Euros per month. I am a student, I don't have a lot of money. I want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I am willing to negotiate.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your interest, Nesibe. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must inform you that the apartment is in high demand and I am looking to maximize my rental income. I am sorry, but I cannot accept your offer of 500 Euros per month. Would you be willing to discuss a higher rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I understand. What do you propose?

And also, I want to know if you can provide me with a lease agreement.

Thank you.

Nesibe Trabelsi
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your understanding, Nesibe. I propose a rental price of 800 Euros per month, which would be in line with the market rate for a similar size apartment in the area. As for the lease agreement, I can provide you with a sample agreement upon your acceptance of the rental price. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
